content:
I'm having issues downloading the most recent friends episode
fc2c27cc-3d57-4db1-b0ad-bc4355171b9f.jpg
There was/is a Fly outage going on, but our Pipedream instances are up and running so I'm not sure if that is related. I just invoked a rolling restart to see if that unclogs things...
Hmm actually there's also a Cloudflare outage going on which would also explain it...
Yes it all working ok now thanks. I'd somehow missed the global cloudflare outage :joy:
on the plus side, the CloudFlare engineering blog is always fascinatingly detailed, so i assume there'll be a great write-up for this incident :)

:oof: https://blog.cloudflare.com/18-november-2025-outage/#memory-preallocation
.unwrap() in a critical production code path without any error handling
Rust won't let you have double-free or use-after-free or data-races, but you can still shoot yourself in the foot in other ways :crab:

Alex Barnes said:

I'd somehow missed the global cloudflare outage :joy:

I found out because I was telling my wife I couldn’t see her grocery list on our picture frame/house organization thing that she knows I kind of hate because I could DIY something better and when she couldn’t get to it on her phone she said “WHAT DID YOU DO?!”

bahaha, RE: renaming unwrap to something that will magically prevent all future problems:
https://bsky.app/profile/brianloveswords.com/post/3m5ypyx5y3c26
